sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class Signup extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ fn : "", ln : "", dob : "", phn : "", email : "", id : "", pswrd : "" } } onChangeHandler=(evt)=>{ this.setState({ [evt.target.name] : evt.target.value }) console.log(this.state) } submit =()=>{ fetch('/signup',{ method : "POST", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(this.state) }) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then(res => console.log(res)) } render() { return (

Sign up

) } }
